Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at California. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at California. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a mechanical problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a mechanical problem on the train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
